name: A Monster's Story
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 and was made in 7 days.

-Description-

A short story based, platformer surrounding the story of a little monster standing up to the Hero that's been terrorizing them all.

-HOW TO PLAY-

Move - WASD or Arrows

Attack - H

Interact - E

Look Down - S or Down Arrow

Pause - ESC

-Notes-

This is probably the biggest scope I've had for a game jam before, but I am really happy with what I managed to achieve. It's still kind of buggy and the game itself is really short, but I hope to add to this idea in the future.

The story is also kind of dark and meant to highlight how when we, the players, play as the hero we are essentially unstoppable.

-Credits- Art:
By RunninBlood Music:  By ArchOfDream Sound:
